procedural_fairness: Guideline 7 violates principles of natural justice and procedural fairness
administrative_decision: Guideline 7 mandates a specific questioning order in refugee hearings
decision_reasoning: institutional pressure to follow the guideline strictly
cause_of_action: Applicant challenged the legality of Guideline 7
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed whether Guideline 7 was inherently unfair, fettered Board discretion, or distorted the adjudicative role
result_of_case: court found Guideline 7 fetters Board discretion, violating procedural fairness, leading to the quashing of the Board's decision
